description: Ratingo monorepo: NestJS API (apps/api) + Next.js web app (apps/web)
rules: Keep NestJS code organized by modules with clear application/domain/infrastructure/presentation boundaries.
Validate all request DTOs using class-validator and keep response contracts stable (prefer { data, meta } for paginated lists).
For Next.js, prefer server-safe code in server components/routes and keep API calls typed and centralized.
